string.text: Obtener la siguiente tarea
Recibe tu próxima tarea.
Alguien que conozco necesita ayuda. Él es un cabrón, pero merece ayuda. Informe a él y vea lo que quiere.
Buena suerte, stalker.
Asalta el campamento enemigo para Deber
Dirige una incursión de servicio contra un campamento enemigo.
We're preparing a raid on an enemy camp. Necesito que lideres el asalto.
Excelente trabajo. Eres un buen guerrero.
Localiza el equipo del Quemador Cerebral
Un stalker ha eliminado una parte del Quemador Cerebral y la ha escondido en algún lugar de la Zona. Find it and return it to Colonel Petrenko

Tengo información de que un stalker ha logrado robar un equipo del Quemador Cerebral y lo escondió en alguna parte. Debemos recuperarlo, podría ser un arma poderosa y no debe caer en las manos equivocadas. Hay algunos lugares donde podría estar escondido. Tengo la mitad de la base buscando por ahora. Quiero que revises una de las ubicaciones posibles. Si lo encuentras, tráelo aquí de inmediato.
Lo has hecho bien. Gracias.
Petrenko's Most Wanted
A certain faction member has risen to the top of Colonel Petrenko's most wanted list and he wants him executed.

Hay un miembro de cierta facción que me ha causado más problemas que cualquier otra persona en la Zona. Hasta el momento ninguno de mis hombres ha podido llegar a él. Si puedes matarlo, te recompensaré bien.
Bien, ¡te deshice de ese imbécil! Buen trabajo. Aquí está tu pago.
Buscar Lab X-19
Colonel Petrenko will pay handsomely for any documents found inside Lab X-19 in Radar.

Mis fuentes me dicen que planeas infiltrarte en Quemador Cerebral en Radar. Creo que estás loco, pero si realmente vas a seguir adelante, tengo una oferta para ti. Recupera cualquier documentación que encuentres allí. Yo te recompensaré bien.
Excelente trabajo. Lo has hecho bien.
Obtener la siguiente tarea
Recibe tu próxima tarea.
Un amigo mío podría usar tu ayuda. Ve a verlo
Buena suerte, stalker.
Encontrar Reemplazo %s para Mangun
Mangun jodió una reparación y necesita un %s de reemplazo para su cliente.
Necesito ayuda, hermano. Un miembro de Deber me trajo su rifle para repararlo, pero lo arruiné bastante mal. Necesito encontrar un reemplazo para él antes de que venga a recogerlo.
Si encuentras un %s, tráemelo. I don't have much money but I have something I can trade you for it.
Hola, genial! Encontraste uno. Gracias hermano, me salvaste el culo.
Limpeza de mutantes para Mangun
Mangun necesita el camino fuera del Bar libre de mutantes.

Oye hermano, ¿puedes hacer algo por mí? Tengo que irme a algún lado pero escuché que hay mutantes en el camino que sale del Bar. I'm no good at shooting, may aim is all shaky for some reason. Could you clear them out for me? Tengo un rifle que un cliente nunca recogió y que puedo darte.
Gracias hermano. Here's the rifle I promised you. Hope you have better luck than its previous owner... poor guy. Lo bueno es que me pagó por adelantado, jeje.
Crack Down
General Voronin is encouraging a crackdown on Duty's enemies. Collect %s for a reward.

Listen to me, stalker; while we strive to eradicate the Zone, we cannot ignore our duty to the innocent. On all sides, the average stalker is constantly beset and misled by outlaws, anarchists, and extremists driven by avarice, superstition, and delusion! As always, the monstrosities of the Zone are our real foe, but we must also ensure that free stalkers do not become misguided or come to harm! Thin the forces of those who would dare hurt or corrupt them.

Listen to me, stalker; while we strive to eradicate the Zone, we cannot ignore our duty to the innocent. On all sides, the average stalker is constantly beset and misled by outlaws, anarchists, and extremists driven by avarice, superstition, and delusion! As always, the monstrosities of the Zone are our real foe, but we must also ensure that free stalkers do not become misguided or come to harm! Thin the forces of those who would dare hurt or corrupt them. Bring me %s as proof of your work, and your commitment to our cause shall not go unnoticed.
Excellent job. While we must always protect the world from the Zone, we must never forget to also protect humanity from its greatest of enemies; itself.
Night Terror
Voronin wants to eliminate a dangerous mutant which haunts the Truck Cemetery.

Our patrols reported signs of an exceptionally dangerous mutant haunting the Truck Cemetery. The monster has already taken the lives of several good men, but we have no chance of catching it in daylight. This terror has to stop immediately. Go, wait until nightfall when the beast gets sloppy. Then hunt this abomination down, and destroy it.
Another step toward fulfilling our goal. Allow me to repay our new debt to you.

Even though we have already struck the decisive blow against Sin, its devotees refuse to surrender. Trusted informants have determined that survivors of the faction are busy gathering in Zaton's abandoned substation workshops as we speak. We cannot let them regroup. It is time to finish them off once and for all.
Excellent work! We could not afford to get dragged into yet another long-term conflict.
From Ukraine With Love
An undercover agent needs to be extracted from an enemy faction, kill the other members of the squad and escort him back to the base. The spy has an SVD.

While we have many men undercover among the enemy, we fear one of them is under suspicion. He missed the last few contacts and hasn't left any more messages. He's likely being kept under watch so he can't afford to do anything besides play along until they decide to get rid of him. We need to pull him out. We have located him nearby, but he's with other stalkers. You need to eliminate them and escort our spy back alive. You will recognize him by his rifle, an SVD. He will have to shoot at you to keep up appearances when you attack the group, so plan accordingly.
Excelente, haré que se presente de inmediato.

Hold your fire! I'm a Duty spy! I am sorry for firing at you, but I had to maintain appearances in case the worst happened. I didn't hit you, did I? Let's get back to Rostok. It's best if we go together
Thanks for escorting me back safely. I'll put in a commendation to the General for you when I make my report.
Joining Duty
Gather 12,000 RU and bring it to Colonel Petrenko as a token of your commitment to Duty.

And I suppose you want to join Duty, eh? You have requested quite an honour. Do you think you have what it takes? To defend the world against the horrors of the Zone? To confront criminals and anarchists wherever you find them, whether they're alone or in groups? To place the values and security of both the innocent, and Duty as a whole, above your own?\n \nWe shoulder the burdens that no one else will. If you're serious, bring 12,000 RU as a token of your commitment and I will put in a recommendation to the General for you.
You are now officially a member of Duty. May you live up to our name.
Defender Rostok
Colonel Petrenko has asked you to eliminate a group of stalkers that have been posing a threat to Duty.

The situation is becoming unfavourable. Enemies gather all over the Zone. I'm sending my men out to a few of our adversary's rally points before our foes can properly muster an attack, can you handle this one?
Excelente trabajo. Your service does you credit.
Storm the Enemy
You have been tasked to storm enemy territory for Duty. Report back to Colonel Petrenko after the job is done.

I have a significant commission available. Anarchists and rebels have been holding onto former Spetsnaz territory for too long. If you can plan, prepare, and lead an assault to weaken their grip, you'll be well rewarded.
Gracias, stalker. Duty is indebted to you.
Neutralize Target for Petrenko
El general Petrenko le ha ordenado que busque y elimine un objetivo.

I have some subjects that need removal. The targets are usually murderers, rapists, defectors, enemy operatives or strategists. This target is currently our most urgent. Take him out, and you'll help not only Duty but all right-minded people who work in the Zone.
Great! You do us proud, and such diligence shall not go unrewarded.
Knowing is Half the Battle
Petrenko wants me to find a %s for Duty to study.
The general wants Duty's grunts to get more educated on the horrors they're expected to kill. For that, we'll need some fresh samples to analyze. Are you interested in helping us get some?
The general wants Duty's grunts to get more educated on the horrors they're expected to kill. For that, we'll need some fresh samples to analyze. Bring back a %s, and you'll be well rewarded.
You have earned our gratitude, soldier. Here is your commission.
Encuentra %s para Mangun
%s son requeridos por Mangun para instalar actualizaciones de equipos básicos, debes devolvérselos si encuentras alguno.
I can really use a good set of tools, stalker...and maybe some money. Si está interesado en ayudarme, le diré lo que estoy buscando.
Necesito un conjunto de herramientas básicas. Debe contener lo que necesito. Si puede traer algo para mí, le estaré agradecido, incluso le ofreceré un descuento de aquí en adelante.
Great news dude! I can get back to work now thanks to you.
Encuentra %s para Mangun
%s son requeridos por Mangun para instalar actualizaciones avanzadas de equipos, deberías devolvérselos si encuentras alguno.
Oye, amigo, si encuentras algunas herramientas más avanzadas, te daré un descuento. ¿Me vigilarás? Necesito un conjunto de herramientas avanzadas.
Necesito un conjunto de herramientas avanzadas. Debe contener lo que necesito. Si puede traer algo para mí, le estaré agradecido, incluso le ofreceré un descuento de aquí en adelante.
Great...GREAT! I'm gonna be BIG time, stalker...if I can just get my act together.
Encuentra %s para Mangun
%s son requeridos por Mangun para instalar actualizaciones de equipos expertos, deberías devolvérselos si encuentras alguno.
Oye, amigo, si encuentras algunas herramientas más avanzadas, te daré un descuento. ¿Me vigilarás? Necesito un conjunto de herramientas expertas.
Debe contener lo que necesito. Debe contener lo que necesito. Si puede traer algo para mí, le estaré agradecido, incluso le ofreceré un descuento de aquí en adelante.
Great...GREAT! I'm gonna be BIG time, stalker...if I can just get my act together.
Encuentra el artefacto "%s"
I've agreed to find Barkeep a %s for his artefact smuggling business.
I'm interested in artefacts. I'll give you the coordinates to a certain artefact, you bring it to me. Of course, you'll also get a reward. Sound good?

I need an artefact for some outside clients. They tend to be clergymen, sometimes scientists who didn't make it in with the Ecologists, and other respectable types from the outside. Anyways, they're looking for an artefact called %s. ¿Estás dentro?
Bien hecho, stalker. Aquí está su recompensa.
Kill the stalker
I've agreed to take a stalker out for the Barkeep.
One of the regulars around here turned out to be rotten to the core. Rostok's people would more than happily pay to put flowers on his grave if you catch my drift. So, are you up for it?
Here is your money, just don't get carried away with murdering too much.
Destroy the mutants
Barkeep has hired me to clear out a lair of mutants
Some of my boys got torn up real bad by some mutants on their last expedition. Duty promised to purge the lair in retaliation, but they just haven't gotten around to it. Will you take this on for me?
Buen trabajo, aquí tienes tu dinero.
Bring Barkeep a %s
Barkeep says he will pay well if I can bring him a %s.
One of my clients wants a trophy from a specific mutant. Are you interested?

Did you know the Zone is home to a few tanners and jewellers? Some real exceptional leathers and jewellery are made from mutated skins, hooves...even brains, the maniacs!. If you're interested in helping these guys out, bring me a %s, and there'll be cash in your pocket.
Atta boy. Here's your payment.
Capture Encrypted Documents
Capture encrypted documents and bring them to Barkeep.

So, recently, a stalker let slip some info about a stash containing some rather intriguing documents. I will give you the coordinates and, in exchange for delivering the papers, you'll be well paid. Anything else you find in there is for you to keep.
Great job, stalker.
Encuentra %s
%s is required by Aspirin to work on medical supplies. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily bias is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

There is. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some tablets and ampoules I need to do work on medical supplies. I'll pay you for one of these kits if you can bring a full set back to me.
¡Gran trabajo! Eres mío a lo grande.
Toppers: #$num. $name
Snitch: Your current target is going to be $comm known by the name: $name. He has been seen in $map lately. Buena suerte.
Toppers: Go back to Snitch for your reward.
Snitch: So you did it after all, huh? Bravo! Get back to the 100 Rads, your money is waiting for you.
Awaiting info.
